name: Fart Knight
description:
An 8 vs 8 unity party game, with source code.

Imagine SUPER MARIO BROS if the goal was one side to get to the other.

You could add more stages, more abilities( high jumper, fast runner, hammer turtle attack, fireball attack etc)

The premise is solid for a future game, this one is funny.

3 farts, any of which kills the player behind you and launches you forward.

Uses controllers like xbox or psx
